title: 3 Profitable Amazon KDP Keywords: Planner + Workbooks  Low Competition High Demand

tactics.name: Keyword Research Tools
tactics.description: Use Chrome extensions for keyword analysis and profitability metrics
steps: Use Publisher Rocket (Titans) for QRD scores
Use Amazon Scout Pro for keyword name scores
Analyze BSR, review counts, and price averages
source_quotes: complex trauma workbook has amazing analytics

tactics.name: Sub-Niche Audience Segmentation
tactics.description: Target specific demographics by creating variations of core keywords for distinct audiences.
steps: Identify audience segments (e.g., moms, teens, seniors)
Adjust content structure and language for each segment
Create specialized titles like '2024 Planner for Busy Moms'
caveats: Avoid over-specialization that increases production costs
source_quotes: you could also sub Niche according to what you want just create a general book but make sure you cover all the essentials

tactics.name: Keyword Combination Strategy
tactics.description: Pair high-scoring keywords with related terms to create profitable content.
steps: Use AI tools to generate content outlines
Combine main keywords with sub-niche modifiers
Leverage keywords like '2024 planner' with style/theme variations
source_quotes: take advantage of this beautiful keyword right over here and it'll open the doors for so many other diversions or sub niches

heuristics.name: Review Count Threshold
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize
source_quotes: average reviews are 831 for numerology guide

heuristics.name: Review Count Optimization
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize keywords with higher review counts
